greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplier of polynomial P_n(x) arising from RNA combinatorics.
link: Gheorghe Coserea, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
R. C. Penner, Moduli Spaces and Macromolecules, Bull. Amer. Math. Soc., 53 (2015), 217-268. See p. 259.
formula: a(g) * P_g(0) = A035319(g) = (4*g-1)!!/(2*g+1), where P_g(x) is the polynomial associated with row g of the triangle A270791.
program: Qset(n, g, v) = { Q[n+1, g+1] = v };
Kol(g) = vector(Qn()+2-F-2*g, n, polcoeff(Qget(n+F-2 + 2*g, g), F, 'x));
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 28 2016
